entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
entry.data: FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING

SHOWERS LIKELY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
